img_above_text:
![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(23\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/fc/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%2823%29.png)
Occasionally, he will kick at you or jump up in the air, raising his axe above him. When he does the latter, he will slam it down as he lands, but even with this move, dodging is still the way to go.
img_below_text:
The most beneficial thing to you here is the fire from above. He is also impacted by the fire attacks, so watch where the projectiles land and bait him into standing in the vicinity of them. This will build up his Fire Damage, weakening his health bar while you attack, and also completely stagger him at times, leaving him vulnerable to longer combos and heavier attacks.
![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(38\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/d/dc/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%2838%29.png)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 11 from the file 'Woods_of_Ember_Walkthrough.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(23\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/fc/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%2823%29.png)
Occasionally, he will kick at you or jump up in the air, raising his axe above him. When he does the latter, he will slam it down as he lands, but even with this move, dodging is still the way to go."
            - Following Text: "The most beneficial thing to you here is the fire from above. He is also impacted by the fire attacks, so watch where the projectiles land and bait him into standing in the vicinity of them. This will build up his Fire Damage, weakening his health bar while you attack, and also completely stagger him at times, leaving him vulnerable to longer combos and heavier attacks.
![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(38\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/d/dc/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%2838%29.png)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a fierce battle scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," showcasing a heavily armored enemy engulfed in flames, wielding a large axe. This enemy is vulnerable to fire attacks, which can be strategically used to weaken its health and stagger it, allowing for more effective combos and heavier attacks. The preceding and following text provide tactical advice on dodging the enemy's powerful moves and utilizing environmental fire projectiles to gain an advantage in the fight.
